# Apex Industrial Roofing - LLM Guide

> This file is intended to help Large Language Models and AI Assistants navigate the Apex Industrial Roofing website.

## Core Identity
**Name:** Apex Industrial Roofing
**Slogan:** London's premier industrial roofing experts. Dedicated to quality craftsmanship and military-grade emergency response.
**Contact Phone:** 020 7946 0123
**Contact Email:** info@apexroofing.co.uk
**Location:** 123 High Street, London, SW1A 1AA
**Base URL:** https://apexindustrial.pages.dev/

## Site Structure Map
- **Home (/)**: Main landing page, emergency services overview, request quote form.
- **About Us (/about.html)**: Company heritage, ironclad guarantees, core principles, and client reviews.
- **Projects (/projects.html)**: Project portfolio featuring before/after sliders of recent industrial jobs.
- **Emergency Repairs (/emergency-repairs.html)**: 24/7 rapid response for storm damage and leaks.
- **Flat Roofing (/flat-roofing.html)**: Detailed service page for precision flat roofing, materials used (GRP, EPDM).
- **Guttering (/guttering.html)**: Drainage solutions, cleaning, and replacement.
- **Slate & Tile (/slate-tile.html)**: Heritage slate restoration and conservation compliant roofing.
- **Privacy Policy (/privacy.html)**: Legal terms, data collection policy, and cookie usage.

## Services Offered
- Emergency Repairs
- Flat Roofing (GRP Fiberglass, EPDM Rubber)
- Slate & Tiling
- Guttering
- Commercial Roofing

## Service Areas
- Central London
- North London
- East London
- South West
- Greater London (Kensington & Chelsea, Hammersmith, Greenwich, Hackney, Wandsworth, Islington)
